mapper.select: SELECT * FROM plan JOIN planitem on plan.no = planitem.plan_no WHERE plan.no = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan (title, start_date, end_date, reg_date, user_no) VALUES (#{title}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, now(), #{userNo})
INSERT INTO planItem (plan_date, place, lat, lng, memo, plan_sort, reg_date, plan_no) VALUES (#{planDate}, #{place}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{memo}, #{planSort}, now(), #{planNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE plan SET title= #{title}, start_date= #{startDate}, end_date= #{endDate} WHERE no= #{no}
UPDATE planItem SET plan_date= #{planDate}, place= #{place}, lat= #{lat}, lng= #{lng}, memo= #{memo}, plan_sort= #{planSort} WHERE no= #{no} AND plan_no= #{planNo}
